briefTitle: MIRNA Profiling of Breast Cancer in Patients Undergoing Neoadjuvant or Adjuvant Treatment for Locally Advanced & Inflammatory Breast Cancer
officialTitle: MIRNA Profiling of Breast Cancer in Patients Undergoing Neoadjuvant or Adjuvant Treatment for Locally Advanced & Inflammatory Breast Cancer
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Performance of miRNA profiling from tumor samples from primary breast tumors
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Female,
* Breast Cancer
* \> 18 years,
* regardless of histology, treatment phase, or stage

Exclusion Criteria:

-
